question:
4. Salah satu janji Yesus kepada para Rasul-Nya yang la utus untuk mewartakan Injil atau kabar    baik kepada semua bangsa, adalah
A. akan diberikan umur yang panjang
B. akan diberikan keturunan yang banyak
C. akan menyertai mereka senantiasa sampai akahir zaman
D. akan diberikan harta dan kekayaan.​

answers.answer:
Jawabannya C.

Semoga membantu dan semoga benar

Jawaban:

C.akan menyertai mereka senantiasa sampai akhir zaman .

related_questions.question:
1. If I... (to study), I... (to pass) ... the exam    C. Studied - will study
A. Study - would study X
B. Study - will study
D. Studied - would have studied
2. If the sun ... (to shine), we... (to walk) into town
C. Shines - will shine
A. Shine - would shine
D. Shone - would have shone
B. Shine - will shine
(to see the doctor
3. If he ... (to have) a temperature, he
A. Have - will see
C. Had - will see
B. Has - will see
D. Having - will see
4. If you (go)... by bike more often, you (be/not).. so flabby
A Go - would not be
B. Went - would not be
C. Goes - would not be
D. Going would not be​

answers.answer:
Jawaban

1. If I STUDIED, I WOULD pass the exam.

2. If the sun shines, we will walk into town

3. If he has a temperature, he will see the doctor. (textnya qkira kira aja cz klimat g lngkap)

4. B

Penjelasan:

coba cek soal 1-3. No.4 aj yg soalnya bner nulisnya

related_questions.question:
CAUTION    LIVE, CHILDREN PLAYING

 What does the above caution mean?
A.	Children are playing games around the place.
B.	Children are not allowed to play around the area.
C.	It is the place for children to play around here.
D.	You have to be careful because children are playing there.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

D. You have to be careful because children are playing there.

Semoga benar dan menjadi jawaban terbaik ya :)

Jawaban:

D you have to be careaful because children are playing there

btw

related_questions.question:
2. CLAIR: Dad, can I borrow your car? i need to go to Alan's house to do our homework together    FATHER Please make sure that you get home before 8 pm
CLAIR Thanks. Dad
I'm afraid you can't
C. Yes, you can
I'm sorry, I need the car
D. No, thanks​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

2. CLAIR: Dad, can I borrow your car? i need to go to Alan's house to do our homework together

FATHER Please make sure that you get home before 8 pm

CLAIR Thanks. Dad

I'm afraid you can't

C. Yes, you can

I'm sorry, I need the car

D. No, thanks​

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan ditentukan dari reaksi Clair yang berterima kasih pada ayahnya, maka jawabannya adalah poin C. Yes, you can. Pilihan lain semuanya salah.

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question:
7. AGA : Vino, can you help me fix my computer?    VINO: I'd love to, but today my schedule is full. What about tomorrow?
From the conversation, we know that ...
A. Vino cannot help Aga.
C. Vino refuses to help Aga.
B. Vino will fix Aga's computer today D. Vino will fix Aga's computer tomorrow​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Jawabannya adalah D. Vino will fix Aga's computer tomorrow

Jawaban:

D. Vino will fix Aga's coputer tomorrow

Thanyou <3
